channel.title: Anomalous Materials interactivity idea
channel.description:
![20170405202407_1.jpg|690x500](upload://kjSd7wxVKeqlflKyLZAwwKa75XD.jpeg)
This guy asked for someone to bring him a calculator. I found one in another office and brought it to him. Okay, so he did react because I sorta made it collide with him... but didn't throw. And he gets all mad for me bringing him what he asked for. Rude scientist! I was trying to be nice :frowning:

item.title: Anomalous Materials interactivity idea
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I was semi-joking, tbh. I’m well aware how bloody hard it is to implement new anything in maps as big as Black Mesa’s. Probably the only thing I’d personally want to see would be a restored version of the full teleportation sequence once Xen ships, but hopefully that’s in the pipe. I was floored by some of the things in Retail I’ve been seeing on my latest playthrough. I torched a couple zombies in one hallway and it set off fire sprinklers. Great little moment that really helped the facility feel alive.

Read full topic

item.title: Anomalous Materials interactivity idea
item.dc:creator: lambdaman
item.description:
On the topic of small little details:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDmcwfn8y0lMtlqcpUhggk0FB1EC2i3iB

Now, granted, most of these aren’t little details, but have some of them worked their way into Black Mesa? (e.g feeding bullsquid or shockwave behaviour) If they haven’t, it would be really cool if they did. I know you guys are working on Xen and all that stuff, but this could probably be implemented later.

Read full topic
